definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
verbal classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word applying mainly to verbs

sentences.english: This should come from both increased activity and better eating.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过增加活动量和改善饮食来达到这一目标。

sentences.english: 2mv That the wall has momentum 2 mv, it's nonnegotiable.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁的动量为，这是毫无疑问的。

sentences.english: The amount of respiration depends upon the degree of activity of the organism.
sentences.chinese: 生物体呼吸量的大小取决于其活动量的大小。

sentences.english: The field is highly competitive, with a significant amount of employee turnover;
sentences.chinese: 因为雇员的流动量相当大，这个领域的竞争相当激烈。

sentences.english: The modifications of energy and momenta are better understood than the effects on distance.
sentences.chinese: 至于对距离的影响，则比能量及动量的调整更难理解。

sentences.english: The transversal momentum behavior of the longitudinal structure function of the nucleon is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了核子的纵向结构函数的横动量行为。

sentences.english: Both groups were fed the same high-fat food, and both had the same amount of daily physical activity.
sentences.chinese: 它们吃同样的高脂肪食物，每天有同样的活动量。

sentences.english: Why? Because it has angular momentum.
sentences.chinese: 为什么，因为有了一个角动量。

sentences.english: Study subjects were grouped according to the amount of activity they reported.
sentences.chinese: 研究对象被根据他们报告的活动量进行分组。

sentences.english: During the past four lectures, we have dealt with angular momentum, torques and rolling objects and rotations.
sentences.chinese: 前四讲中，我们讨论过角动量，力矩滚动物体及旋转。

sentences.english: The harder we work, the more of these molecules we need.
sentences.chinese: 人体劳动量越大，对这些分子的需求就越多。

sentences.english: A falling object gains momentum as it falls.
Angular momentum is pointing straight at me, away from you.
sentences.chinese: 角动量直接指向我，远离你们的方向。

sentences.english: Set up was a momentum analysis model of the drift velocity in stagnant liquid of long bubbles in an annular tube.
sentences.chinese: 建立圆管内滞止液体中长气泡漂移速度动量分析模型。

definition: conservation (e.g. of energy, momentum or heat in physics)/to remain constant (of a number)
simple harmonic motion (in mechanics)/motion of a simple pendulum
